subject: Hi Everyone!!
author: CJ
full_text:
Just wanted to introduce myself. My name is Carla and I recorded my first evp 2 nights ago. 
Again yesterday I was able to get another one but have not been able to tell what it says. I 
am going to post them in the file section if anyone is interested. I also was wondering what 
everyone thought, especially on the 2nd one since I still don't know what it says. Thanks!
